title: EV battery explosion claims life in Nizamabad, two injured
description: Adding fuel to concerns around electric vehicle battery safety, a case of battery explosion has been reported. An 80-year-old man died while his wife and grandson suffered burn injuries when the battery of an electric scooter exploded in their house in Nizamabad town on Tuesday night, as per TOI.
